HEAD OF ADVERTISING SYSTEM ENGINEERING_HANOI_$$4000
1. JOB DESCRIPTION
• Developing architecture of the system
• Developing critical components for back end components and databases
• Maintaining system operability
• Planning infrastructure
• Support of project management process
• Participate in product development strategy
• Team management:
o Back end development - supervision and programming of most critical components
o Front end development - supervision and coordination
o Front line support - supervision and coaching.
•  Report to: Head of Advertising (Russian; interviewed in English)
Team size & structure: 20+ ppl; including testers; Software Engineers; Ads Engine team.
Salary range: 4000USD gross x 13 months
• Process interview: 3 steps
- Step 1: Interview with HRM 
- Step 2: Interview with  Head of Monetization; Head of BI.
- Step 3: Interview with other technical dept (sysadmin; ad engine)
2. JOB REQUIREMENTS
• MS degree in Computer Science / Math
• 10+ years of experience in server-side development (C++; Java)
• Expert in C++ programing
• Have knowledge of database management; algorithms; test management; architecture of server application development; development network applications; technical resources planning
• Working experience with C++14; boost; gtest; git; Python; Bash; CMake; ClickHouse?; MongoDB; Redis; Kafka; MySql?; ZeroMQ; NGINX; kohana; php; angular; single-page-applications; deb packages
• Working knowledge in on-line advertising field
• Have the capability of managing a team of 15+ people
• Good spoken and written English.
3. BENEFITS
• Flexible working hours; 05 working days/1 week; no Over Time
• Remote work policy and casual clothes
• 13th-month bonus
• Trade Union benefits for staff and family: 5M VND for wedding; 5M VND for a new born child; 1M VND for birthday
• Annual leave: 12 days/year; bonus 0.5 days/a year of working
• Sick leave without Medical Certificate: 7 days/year
• Medical support (Medical Expenses): Diagnostic & Out-patient treatment: 12M/year; In-patient treatment: 12M/year; Pregnancy & Childbirth: 12M/year; Surgical operation & Hospitalization: 100%
• Doing great work with talented colleagues in the international working environment
• Participating in many exciting internal events: All-Hands Meeting; Happy Hour; Team-building; 08/03; 20/10; Men’s Day; X-mas; Year End Party ... to make you feel like home when working 
• Joining many interesting Hobby Clubs: Yoga; Bicycle; Painting; Board game...
• Modern and cozy kitchen with plenty of free noodles; coffee/tea bar and fresh fruits every day.
Interested candidate who wish to apply for the advertised position. please email us an copy of your update resume.
Email Address: talentvn@talenttradergroup.com
For candidate who applied for the advertised position is deemed to have consented to us that we may collect; use or disclose your personal information for purpose in connection with the services provided by us.- Have a long term working desire with us.

Position Title:  Junior Software Testing Engineer
Work location:  Ho Chi Minh City
Salary range: 400 - 550 USD
Job Tags: IT/Computer – Software/Network/System/Database Admin; Network/ System Engineer; Software Quality Assurance; Software Engineer/ Programmer
 
Job Descriptions:
 
You have great passion in testing fields; you love testing and finding bugs/issues within a software; then you could be suited to a career in software testing at Dory. As a software tester; you are involved in the quality assurance stage of our software development. You will conduct automated and manual tests to ensure our software is fit for purpose before it gets deployed to our clients. Dory is now looking for honesty and qualified candidates for a junior STE. Your duties and responsibilities include as follows:
  • Running manual and automated tests.
  • Performing functional and performance tests.
  • Working on multiple projects at one time.
  • Presenting and communicating findings in English to colleagues.
  • Writing bug reports.
  • Testing in different environments including web and mobile.
  • Taking main responsibilities for daily tasks following guidelines.

Job Requirement
  • Bachelor’s degree in mathematics; science; or engineering field (High GPA is a plus) for regular STE; and graduated junior college for junior STE.
  • At least 1 year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Having passion in the testing field; and great aptitude plus right attitude.
  • Good communication skill.
  • Good analytical and problem solving skill and out of box thinking.
  • Excellent knowledge of how software applications are created and how they work.
  • Programming skill is helpful but not required.
  • Ability to understand the basics of automation testing and get started quickly on any given automation tool.
  • Ability to manage time well.
  • Ability to read and write in English fluently.
Benefits:
  • Flexible and friendly environment and casual dress code.
  • 13th salary and company subsidized gas; snacks; and meal plan.
  • Monday-Friday; work 40-hours weekly.
  • Excellent benefits: sick leave and vacation time for all employees.
  • Compulsory insurances according to Vietnam labor code. Also; full-time employees eligible for healthcare; provided by Liberty Insurance.
Click “ Apply Now ” and advance your career with Jobstreet.com!

ZALORA has been redefining online shopping experiences across the region via its extensive collections of top international and local brands as well as innovative solutions to customers.
 
Why ZALORA Vietnam?
- Start-up culture; flat organization with global knowledge sharing
- Steep learning curve and opportunity to make an impact early on within a rapid-growing industry
- Regional & global career growth opportunities 

Role               : Technical Product Executive
Department  : Marketing
Report to   : Product Manager
Location    : Ho Chi Minh City; District 1
https://www.facebook.com/zaloravietnamcareers/
 
Job Description:
 
The Product Executive is responsible for both frontend and backend services.
- Primary objectives:
o Work as a junior full-stack developer and a product executive
ï‚§ Developing tools or web-app to improve operation processes
ï‚§ Create website layout by using standard HTML/CSS practices
ï‚§ Integrate data from various back-end services and databases
o Be the point of contact for any requests and questions about ZALORA software systems (CMS – content management system; OMS – order management system; Seller Center…)
o Stay plugged into emerging technologies/industry trends and apply them into operations and activities
- Required
o Hands-on experience of HTML; CSS; JQUERY
o Some experience with any server side technology: PHP; Nodejs; Python…
o Knowledge of relational database systems; Object Oriented Programming and web application development
o Ability to work and thrive in a fast-paced environment; learn rapidly and master diverse new technologies and techniques
o Highly responsible and disciplinary.
o Curious; solid analytical and problem solving skills
- Bonus; not required
o Excel; VBA; VBScript; automation tool like iMacros; AutoHotkey; Selenium
o Data analysis skill
o Familiar with integrating third-party services API
o Understanding of any e-Commerce processes and softwares
What do we offer in return?
- Insight into processes of an e-commerce company
- Knowledge about feature specification and feature development
- Integration into highly skilled; successful and ambitious team
- A versatile and responsible role
- The ability to make an immediate impact - we’re an agile company and your ideas and effort matter!
- Fun & casual working atmosphere; flexible working time
- International mind-set and close collaboration with management

Direct the company’s overall marketing and strategic planning programs; and corporate communications towards the successful promotion of its core products & services; namely:
Givral Concept Outlets - Bakeshop; Casual Dining Restaurants; Café
Givral Coffee & Tea Line
  • Design; implement and facilitate local store and store-wide brand marketing program; covering: Brand Development; brand Management; Research and Development; Advertising & Promotions; Communications & Public Relations; Customer Relations Management; Events Management.
  • Manage; control and administer the company approved marketing budgets.
  • Organize and implement client relations including client satisfaction surveys; client development activities; special events.
  • Responsible for revenue management by overseeing the development of strategic pricing of products and services offered.
  • Engage and create alliances with vendors; suppliers; prospect sponsors to create cost efficient promotions; events; marketing tie-ups/ partnerships that are aimed to generate revenue and/or promote the core products and services of the company.
  • Actively lead the company in its business development efforts/ programs to consistently maintain its competence across changing business & industry climates.
  • Implement and oversee corporate communications activities including external communications and systems; internal communications and systems and public relations efforts.
  • Develop and administer marketing database which includes client and prospect information; mailing list applications; promotions vendors; etc.
  • Oversee the company’s electronic marketing efforts including content supervision of web site and all internet-based marketing initiatives.
  • Upon consultation with the General Manager; make staffing and hiring decisions within marketing department.
  • Work; liaise and direct consult with other departments in conjunction with related marketing initiatives.
 
Job Requirement
  • University degree in related fields.
  • Minimum 5 years of experience in the similar position.
  • Marketing management and strategic planning experience.
  • A proven track record in developing and administering a marketing program.
  • Must be a self-starter; highly organized; aggressively proactive and highly visionary.
  • Innovative; polished presentation and interpersonal skills.
  • Excellent communication skills.

Job Summary
Bildretusche24 (BR24.com) is a fun; fast-paced German company specializing in graphic design and 3D. We provide picture editing and CGI services to clients all around the world. Our growing company is currently seeking an experienced IT Project Manager. In this role; the IT Project Manager will be responsible for planning of technology projects; the administration of network and server infrastructure; managing our team of IT professionals and the execution of all technology-related tasks.
Job Responsibilities
  • Manage projects with top-down oversight throughout entire execution to ensure success as defined by adherence to standards of scope and timeline.
  • Develop comprehensive project plans that merge management requirements with company goals and coordinate various technical personnel during all project phases; from initial development through implementation.
  • Monitor project progress continuously and make detailed scheduled reports on measurable items.
  • Communicate proactively with Production department to provide encouragement; identify problems; create solutions; and implement efficiency improvements.
  • Review proposed modifications on project plans; including meeting with interested parties to approve and implement beneficial changes.
  • Anticipate details of future projects by communicating directly with customers and staying informed of relevant trends and industry news
  • Participate in recruitment; orientation and ongoing training of new IT staff
Job Skills & Qualifications
  • Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science; Information Technology or related field
  • In-depth knowledge of Agile methodologies
  • Excellent English in written and verbal communication skills
  • Able to clearly communicate technical concepts to both technical and non-technical audience
  • Extensive leadership experience and strong teaming abilities
  • Excellent problem-solving skills
  • Minimum two-year management experience in the IT field
  • Proficiency with PHP is a plus
  • Proficiency with BPMN; Dia is a plus
BR24 offers a competitive benefits package & great work environment. These includes:
  • Competitive Salary
  • Free lunch
  • Insurances
  • High emphasis on professional growth
  • Casual dress code

Working location: Hanoi
 
Job description:
  • Catering managers plan; organise and develop the food and beverage services of organisations and businesses; while meeting customer expectations; food and hygiene standards and financial targets.
  • The catering manager usually has a hands-on role and is involved in the day-to-day running of the operation including staff supervision and events management.
  • The catering manager might have the help of other managers and supervisors to handle the different catering functions and catering outlets.
  • Typical work activities: The day-to-day routine of a catering manager is likely to vary greatly but can include:
  • managing the food and beverage provision for functions and events;
  • supervising catering and waiting staff at functions;
  • planning menus in consultation with chefs;
  • recruiting and training permanent and casual staff;
  • organising; leading and motivating the catering team;
  • planning staff shifts and rotas;
  • ensuring health and safety regulations are strictly observed;
  • budgeting and establishing financial targets and forecasts;
  • monitoring the quality of the product and service provided;
  • keeping financial and administrative records;
  • maintaining stock levels and ordering new supplies as required;
  • interacting with customers if involved with front of house work;
  • liaising with suppliers and clients;
  • negotiating contracts with customers; assessing their requirements and ensuring they are satisfied with the service delivered (in contract catering);
  • ensuring compliance with all fire; licensing; and employment regulations;
  • maximising sales and meeting profit and financial expectations.
  • overseeing the management of facilities; e.g. checking event bookings and allocation of resources/staff
  • planning new promotions and initiatives; and contributing to business development;
    dealing with staffing and client issues;
  • keeping abreast of trends and developments in the industry; such as menus or trends in consumer tastes.
Requirements:
  • Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree; Food & Beverage Services Management; Business Studies/Administration/Management; Marketing or equivalent.
  • Required skills: english communication; microsoft office; presentations and demonstrations; catering service; Team Leader And Motivator.
  • Required languages: English; Vietnamese
  • At least 4 years of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Preferably Managers specializing in Food/Beverage/Restaurant Service or equivalent.
  • Full-Time positions available.
  • Work location: Ha Noi.

PURPOSE:
• Assist UW Senior Manager/Deputy Manager in the operation of UW Division to help achieve the planned objectives of the Company.
CONTEXT:
• All classes of insurance business in Vietnam
DIMENSIONS:
• Maintain UW guidelines and Policy wording/ clauses standards.
• Handling UW referrals;
• Review work procedure with view of control; increased productivity and efficiency.
 
KEY OUTPUTS:
• Work with Marketing Divisions on underwriting new and renewal businesses according to risk assessment; underwriting authority limit and treaty terms and conditions.
• Monitor/ control  acceptance of risks to ensure that UW guideline and treaties limit continue to be complied;
• Provide technical support to Marketing team including monitoring and maintaining policy wordings; underwriting document templates; etc.
• Assist senior staff in UW Division in following up reinsurance placement with facultative reinsurers;
• Develop; maintain UW statistics and prepare UW reports.
• Analyse new product request and support Marketing Divisions on new product development.
• Other underwriting/reinsurance work as assigned by Company
RELATIONSHIPS:
• MSIG VN’s staff (Reinsurance; Business Processing; Marketing; Accounting) and other industry peers.
DECISION MAKING AUTHORITY:
• To understand and act within delegated authority given.
KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS:
• State of UW statistics and UW guidelines
• Proper risk acceptance within UW Guideline
• Standard of response to other related Department/ Customers.
 
QUALIFICATIONS:
• University Graduation
• English fluency.

SKILLS/KNOWLEDGE:
• Sound UW knowledge.
• Good communication skills.
• In depth knowledge of insurance; products; insurance contracts;
• Have knowledge about types and methods of reinsurance.
EXPERIENCE:
At least 2 - 3 years of progressively more responsible property/casualty underwriting.
Prior experience in underwriting business is preferable.
 
Details of job description and selection requirements of this position are posted at www.msig.com.vn
Starting date: As soon as possible
Written application in English; stating why you are suitable for the post; together with full curriculum vitae should be sent by 30 Oct 2017 to Email: recruit@vn.msig-asia.com
 
* Note: Only short-listed candidates will be contacted. Applications will not be returned.
Applications will be on first come first serve basis.
MSIG is an equal opportunity employer.

Dear Our Value candidates;

Our client is Viet Nam Group  in Construction and Interior Design Industry. They are looking for high qualified candidate: HR Manager position 
  • Report to: Board Of Director
  • Take care: 7 staffs
  • Working location: HCM City
RESPONSIBILITIES
Planning:

• Base on the Company strategies to prepare personnel forecast; projection and setting; following up budgets for personnel operations.
• Maintain records and compile statistical reports concerning personnel-related data such as hires; transfers; and absenteeism; retention and turnover rates.
• Provide guidance to management of effective utilization of people capability such as: full-time employees; contract labor; casual and temporary employees.
Recruitment & Selection:
• Design the recruitment & selection process of company.
• Monitor the implementation of recruitment & selection process; co-ordinate with Dept. Managers or upper level management in selection & hiring.
• Establish a recruiting; testing; and interviewing program; counseling managers on candidate selection.
• Maintain the work structure by build-up & updating job requirements and job descriptions for all positions.
• Design and handle Company induction program for new hirers.
• Make human resource plan
Training & development:

• Design and conduct new hired employees’ orientation and induction program to foster positive attitude toward organizational objectives.
• Co-ordinate with Dept. Managers to analyze training and development needs.
• Provide training to all employees with full information about Company policies & procedures; job duties; working conditions; wages; and opportunities for promotion and employee benefits; health & safety programs…
• Provide HR Basic skills training to facto manager and team-leaders.
• Build up a learning culture in an organization
Performance management:

• Co-ordinate with Dept. Managers & BOD to build up and implement Company performance management system for management level & staff level.
• Ensure planning; monitoring; and appraisal of employee work results by training managers to coach and discipline employees; scheduling management conferences with employees; hearing and resolving employee grievances; counseling employees and supervisors.
• Set up KPI and reward system for company based on Project; people; service and profits…
• Audit human resources practices of HR team and department team for compliance with Vietnamese Labor laws and regulations; provide directions to the team to meet Company standards.
• Organize & conduct employee survey programs.
Compensation & Benefits:
• Coordinate to establish company policies; regulations; handbook & SOPs relating to business operations for the company.
• Plan; direct; supervise; and coordinate work activities of subordinates and staff relating to employment; compensation; labor relations; and employee relations.
• Analyze and modify compensation and benefits policies to establish competitive programs and ensure compliance with legal requirements.
• Administer payroll; C&B; PIT record & statistic; savings bond programs; day-care and performance management systems.
• Analyze statistical data and reports to identify and determine causes of personnel problems and develop recommendations for improvement of organization's personnel policies and practices.
• Contact with Authorities to make sure company’s handbook; SOPs; regulations & activities compliance with Labor Code & relating documents.
• Build up payment plan; preparing pay budgets; monitoring and scheduling individual pay actions; recommending; planning; and implementing pay structure revisions.
• Maintain employee benefits programs and informs employees of benefits by studying and assessing benefit needs and trends; recommending benefit programs to management; directing the processing of benefit claims.
• Ensure legal compliance by monitoring and implementing applicable human resource state requirements; conducting investigations; maintaining records; representing the organization in dealing with Authorities.
• Maintains management guidelines by preparing; updating; and recommending human resource policies and procedures.
Employee relations:
• Serve as a link between management and employees by handling questions; interpreting and administering contracts and helping resolve work-related problems.
• Represent organization at personnel-related hearings and investigations.
• Negotiate bargaining agreements and help interpret labor contracts.
• Conduct exit interviews to analyze and identify reasons for employee termination.
• Counsel and discipline employees; planning; monitoring; and appraising employee job results.
• Ensure that employees are trained in up to date legal compliance issues.
• Organize re-creational activities such as: team building; year-end party; company events…
• Take action for disciplinary in line with labor law.
HR Information System:
• Consider & propose the budget for HRIS; survey & work with suppliers to build up and implement the HRIS.
• Maintains historical human resource records by designing a filing and retrieval system; keeping past and current records.
Other tasks assigned by General Manager.
 
REQUIREMENTS
• 5 or more years of Human Resources Generalist experience; including experience in Construction/Furniture.
• Deep knowledge of human resource management and human development
• Skills in planning; communication; negotiation skills; presentation skills.
• Knowledge of labor law and Government regulations.
• Knowledge of principles and procedures for personnel recruitment; selection; training; compensation and benefits; labor relations and negotiation; and personnel information systems.
• Good communication English skills.
• Educational Requirements: BA/BS degree in Human Resources; Law or Business Administration.
 
BENEFIT
• Salary pay: $2000 - $2500; it depends on candidate’s experience and qualification
• More details will be discussed during the interview.
 
If it suits to you & your friend in career path; please apply online your Resume (CV) to sen.nguyen@hrstrategy.vn or call to Ms. Sen at   0123 777 2333.  Thanks!
